title: LF Toplaner Duo to Plat/Diamond (high gold/low plat)
body: I've got some free time, hoping to duo to at least plat and maybe even diamond if we have good synergy. My play style mostly involves getting two lanes ahead and maybe the third lane depending on jg clears and timing. I like getting objectives and turrets a lot. Early sneaky barons. I played jg/top/mid (mid because it's supposed to be in high demand so I'd usually get jg). Voice comms are needed for the cheesiest strats OCE.
